TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ImageUrlEditor extends System.Web.UI.Design.UrlEditor

summary.span: 提供使用者介面，以選取參考影像的 URL。

span.span: Provides a user interface for selecting a URL that references an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是提供的對話方塊中選取參考影像的 URL 屬性。 is a that provides a dialog box for selecting a URL property that references an image. ## Examples [!code-cpp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CPP/webcustomcontrol1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/CS/webcustomcontrol1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebUITypeEditorsExample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebUITypeEditorsExample/VB/webcustomcontrol1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Caption As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

span.span: Gets the caption to display on the selection dialog window.

value.span: 要在 [選取對話方塊] 視窗中顯示的標題。

span.span: The caption to display on the selection dialog window.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Filter As String
protected: virtual property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得編輯器的檔名篩選條件字串。

span.span: Gets the file name filter string for the editor.

summary.span: 此字串用來判斷出現在對話方塊檔案清單中的項目。

span.span: This string is used to determine the items that appear in the file list of the dialog box.

value.span: 篩選條件字串，可用來篩選對話方塊的檔案清單。

span.span: The filter string that can be used to filter the file list of the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定篩選條件字串與兩個篩選選項： 其中一個常見映像檔案副檔名 （*.gif，*.jpg、 *.jpeg，*.bmp，*.wmf，*.png），以及其中的所有檔案 (\*。\*)。The property specifies a filter string with two filter options: one for common image file extensions (*.gif, *.jpg, *.jpeg, *.bmp, *.wmf, *.png), and one for all files (\*.\*). 篩選條件字串，包含一或多個篩選選項。A filter string contains one or more filter options. 每個篩選選項包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 與篩選模式。Each filter option contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同的篩選選項的字串是以分隔號分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 以下是範例包含兩個篩選選項的篩選條件字串:"`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`」。The following is an example of a filter string that contains two filter options: "`Bitmap Files (*.bmp)|*.bmp|All Files (*.*)|*.*`". 您可以指定篩選選項中的數個篩選條件模式，藉由以分號分隔的篩選模式。You can specify several filter patterns in a filter option by separating the filter patterns with semicolons. 以下是範例中的第一個篩選選項會指定三個篩選條件模式的篩選條件字串:"`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`」。The following is an example of a filter string in which the first filter option specifies three filter patterns: "`Image Files(*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif)|*.bmp;*.jpg;*.gif|All Files (*.*)|*.*`".
